alert.note: Alert for Adams; Wells (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 5:25AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Wells and northern Adams Counties through 615 AM EDT... At 524 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bluffton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bluffton, Decatur, Monroe, Preble, Poneto, Vera Cruz, Magley, Travisville, Craigville, Wellsburg, Reiffsburg, Murray, Liberty Center, Dillman, Peterson, Monmouth, North Oaks, Tocsin, Rockford and Curryville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
